mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_cars (car_name, car_number, car_distance, car_year, car_image, car_explain, cop_seq, rsc_seq) values (#{carName}, #{carNumber}, #{carDistance}, #{carYear}, #{carImage}, #{carExplain}, #{copSeq}, #{rscSeq});
mapper.update: update tb_cars set car_seq = #{carSeq}, car_number = #{carNumber}, car_type = #{carType}, car_image = #{carImage}, car_year = #{carYear}, car_distance = #{carDistance};
